name: decoderapp
description: A simple web app to read what's inside the Green Pass QR-code.

scripts.build: npm run build:certificates && npm run build:javascript
scripts.build:certificates: cross-env OUT_DIR='public/assets' EXPORT_MARKDOWN=true MARKDOWN_DIR='docs/' node tools/certs-scraper/index.js
scripts.build:javascript: browserify src/index.js -o public/bundle.js && uglifyjs public/bundle.js --compress -o public/bundle.js
